item.description:
Every 2nd and 4th Friday evening is Dinner With Dharma at the Greater Boston Buddhist Cultural Center at 950 Massachusetts Avenue, between Central and Harvard Squares, Cambridge.

QAO (Question and answer opportunity) at the end of the talk will last about ten to fifteen minute.

6:30 p.m. Meditation
7:00 p.m. Dinner (vegan- but ALWAYS ask because it reminds them)
7:30 p.m. Dharma Talk and Discussion (could go on for 2 hours or more, but it's supposed to be 90 minutes)
Koan Practice

Mei Hung, the Executive Director of the Chinese Culture Connection (CCC), will speak on "Embracing Challenges with Gratitude". During her talk, Mei will share how Buddhist wisdom has influenced her outlook and life and has helped her overcome setbacks during the early part of her American journey and beyond.

With a strong determination to expand her horizons and in search of the meaning of life, Mei Hung came to America many years ago to further her education. She first studied English and worked her way step-by-step through Bunker Hill Community College, then earned her Bachelorâ€™s Degree from Bentley University, then finally at Tufts University earned a Master's Degree in Education and Psychology. Under her leadership at CCC, she develops and delivers new Chinese Culture programs. She also teaches Tai Chi at Boston University and plays the guqin (an ancient Chinese music instrument). Through these practices, she intentionally cultivates serenity, balance, health, and wisdom.

We hope that you, friends, and family will join us this Friday night at 6:30 for meditation followed by our Chinese, vegan buffet at 7:00 pm and the presentation at 7:45 pm.

Cost (Include dinner)
Adult: $10 Student: $5 (student ID required)

PLEASE TAKE CASH ONLY. THEY DO NOT Accepts Credit Cards!!!

Take the T to Central Square, http://www.mbta.com....
Walk in TOWARDS Harvard Square until you see 950 Mass Ave on the left (south) side of the street.

For driving directions please check here
http://maps.google.co...
http://pluralism.org/... - HDS Pluralism Project Profile-Greater Boston Buddhist Cultural Center (GBBCC) - includes history and statistics

We look forward to seeing you there! We'll be there from 6:30pm to7:30pm, likely 9:00 pm, , if we like the talk (and maybe 10 pm - if the socializing afterwards is great).

For more info. for this place, please check http://www.yelp.com/b... (please visit Maynard's pictures of the place)

http://www.gbbcc.net... - IF you speak and read Mandarin
item.how_to_find_us: Smile will have Meetup sign and will sit in regular place at her/our regular table!

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner With Dharma at GBBCC
